## Interview type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Interview<Q, S, C, A, D extends number = 3> = A | {
    [K in keyof Q]: Question<K, S, C, Q[K], D extends -1 ? A : Interview<Q, S, C, A, Depths[D]>>;
}[keyof Q];
```
